channel.title: [HELP] Changes NOT appearing
channel.description:
i have made several changes to my itemdef.xml and my npcdef.xml (things like changing the name of NPC's) then i compile and restart server and client but changes are not showing in game
example: i changed "flynn" to "K0 Mace Salesman" then saved and compiled but in the games after restarting it still says "flynn"
how is this possible ? and can someone please help me fix this issue?
Thanks in Advance

item.title: [HELP] Changes NOT appearing
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:3, topic:359578”][quote author=12estlessk0 link=topic=456022.msg3338514#msg3338514 date=1284160787]
so use the editor and make that XML file into a rscd file and overwrite the existing file in the client side?

also if i released my client on my site so people could play and i made a change the server side the client wouldnt just update i would have to upload the updated client to my site and everyone would have to redownload in every time i updated?
[/quote]
Yeah, pretty much. It depends on what you’re changing but yeah most of the time you need to do that.[/quote]

Wow that helps me out a ton…

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Changes NOT appearing
item.dc:creator: @Asylum Asylum
item.description:
@Asylum wrote:

If it makes you feel more comfortable, change the name that it looks for in the EntityHandler class.

Read full topic
